column4: dual amd64, ati x1300, 1gb mem, 19" widescreen dvi monitor, CAN'T get ubuntu live cd to work, i would really appreciate some help
Jack, it goes through the boot and then looses the monitor
you have an onboard video card?
also when the desktop should come up, quick check to see if it's technically running is to type "alt-f2" and then "eject /dev/cdrom" and see if the cd pops out
